item.description: A big thank you for your article.Really thank you! Cool. fbbegdggek
item.content:encoded: A big thank you for your article.Really thank you! Cool. fbbegdggek

item.title: By: Cameron McKenzie
item.dc:creator: Cameron McKenzie
item.content:encoded:
Quite a thorough review.

We reviewed it on TheServerSide as well, giving it 9 out of 10. It did make us start wondering what else they might put into a second edition. After reading it, did you find there were any items you would have liked to have seen included? If Martijn doesn’t include some info on Android in the next edition, we’re going to have a word with him.

Please share your thoughts:

http://www.theserverside.com/news/thread.tss?thread_id=71447

item.title: By: Charles Feduke
item.dc:creator: Charles Feduke
item.description: I've been working through this book myself, about 1/3 of the way, and so far I agree with what you've written: this is an excellent book. I find it at least as interesting and well-written as Effective Java (2nd ed).
item.content:encoded: I’ve been working through this book myself, about 1/3 of the way, and so far I agree with what you’ve written: this is an excellent book. I find it at least as interesting and well-written as Effective Java (2nd ed).

item.dc:creator: Onof
item.description: Thanks for this review, I will buy the book
item.content:encoded: Thanks for this review, I will buy the book
